column4: gutsy support is in #ubuntu+1, and i would not recommend mixing ubuntu and debian. dependencies don't work, 'cos names are often different
i read in ahow to that getting the mesa drivers from gutsy is easy and works and i don't have to recompile them
which i found to be a pain (didn't work :D )
so just manually download the package from http://packages.ubuntu.com/ but don't add a repo to your sources.list. gutsy in hevy development, and things are going to break
